patterns: do you guys offer debit card service?

how can i deactivate my debit card?

what are the charges for cards?
can I get cards deliver to home?
can I get debit card delivered to my home?
can I get credit card delivered to my home?
responses: We offer free debit card service but our credit card service costs 1400 Rs/year. Both cards can be delivered to your home address for free. You can also activate/deactivate your card using our online banking service. Just login and click Card from the sidebar.

How many checkbooks can I order at a time?
What is the cost of one checkbook
What is the cost of ordering one checkbook
responses: Each checkbook costs 200 Rs. You need to login and go to the “Order chequebook” option from side bar and select the number of leaves and press the “Order chequebook” button. You can order only 1 checkbook at a time

patterns: How many free services do you guys offer
How many free services are there?
responses: There are many free services offered by our bank. Including internet banking service, debit cards, delivery and many more. To know more about our services. Call our helpline center.

patterns: how can i change my password?

responses: You need to go to the “change password” option from side bar and provide your “Current Password”, “New Password”, and existing Password.

responses: Login and go to the sidebar and click funds transfer. Write the account number of the receiver and the amount you want to transfer.

responses: Login and go to the sidebar and click bill payment. Write the consumer no. or any relevant number according to the company you're paying and the amount you want to pay.

responses: We offer three different types of accounts. Current, Savings and Asaan Account. You can visit any branch to open an account. For any other query, please call helpline.

responses: You have to sign and click on bank statements tab. There you can find your transactions history. Performing transactions is a free service and you can either transfer money to any other account by clicking transfer funds on the sidebar or pay bills by clicking bill payment on the sidebar.

AI is the field of science which concerns itself with building hardware and software that replicates the functions of the human mind.

responses: You can use your existing username and password to login. If you do not have an internet banking account you can register, By creating an account.

patterns: what do you know about internet banking?
responses: Internet Banking is a simple, hassle-free and secure internet banking service available to all Visa Debit Card holder customers and Corporate Clients*. Customer can access the service through Internet and Mobile browser

patterns: Can I access this service overseas?
How can i use this service overseas?
how can i access my account overseas
can i access my account internationally
how will international users access their account
can I access my account from anywhere
responses: Yes. As long as you are able to access the Internet with the recommended internet browser, you will be able to access the service.

patterns: Who can apply for this service?
Who can apply for internet banking
What are the requirements for internet banking?
I want to apply for internet banking service
responses: Any Scarlet Bank account holder with an active Visa Debit Card at any scarlet online branch in Pakistan can apply for this service through “Self Registration”. Further Abroad customer can choose “Abroad” from drop down menu. A *corporate customer needs to contact parent branch to accord this service.

patterns: Can I transfer funds to my other accounts and any scarlet Bank account?
how can i transfer funds to other accounts
responses: Yes. You can transfer funds from your one account to another account. For any transfer in any account other than your own account, you first need to add that account as a beneficiary in order to transfer funds.
